monsters.name: Goblin Scout
monsters.description: A small, green-skinned creature wearing tattered leather armor. It carries a crude dagger and looks ready for trouble.

monsters.name: Female Kobold
monsters.description: The kobold is a small humanoid with doglike facial features and is covered with coarse body hair. She stands just over three feet in height, is wearing a filthy tunic, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Kobold
monsters.description: The kobold is a small humanoid with doglike facial features and is covered with coarse body hair. He stands just under four feet in height, is wearing a filthy tunic, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Orc
monsters.description: The orc is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. She stands just over four feet in height, is wearing a leather tunic, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Orc
monsters.description: The orc is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands just under five feet in height, is wearing a leather cuirass, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Gnoll
monsters.description: The gnoll is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick golden brown body hair. She stands just over six feet in height, is wearing a leather cuirass and trousers, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Gnoll
monsters.description: The gnoll is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just under seven feet in height, is wearing a chainmail shirt and trousers, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Hobgoblin
monsters.description: The hobgoblin is a squat apelike humanoid with dark skin and pointed ears. She stands just under five feet tall, is wearing a leather cuirass, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Hobgoblin
monsters.description: The hobgoblin is a squat apelike humanoid with dark skin and pointed ears. He stands just over five feet tall, is wearing a leather cuirass, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Brigand
monsters.description: The brigand has the look of a common thief, and is dressed in a cheap, but flashy outfit. She is also wearing leather armor and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Brigand
monsters.description: The brigand has the look of a common thief, and is dressed in a cheap, but flashy outfit. He is also wearing chain armor and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Barbarian
monsters.description: The barbarian is dressed in the hides of furred animals, and is armed with {0}. She has a look of great strength and cunning.

monsters.name: Barbarian
monsters.description: The barbarian is dressed in the hides of furred animals, and is armed with {0}. He has a look of great strength and cunning.

monsters.name: Female Centaur
monsters.description: The centaur has the body of a horse with the upper torso, arms, and head of a well built woman. She has long hair which she wears in a tight braid, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Centaur
monsters.description: The centaur has the body of a horse with the upper torso, arms, and head of a well muscled man. He has long hair which he wears in a tight braid, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Satyr
monsters.description: The satyr has the upper torso of well built woman, and the lower torso, legs, and hooves of a goat. She is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Satyr
monsters.description: The satyr has the upper torso of man with a lot of body hair, and the lower torso, legs, and hooves of a goat. He is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Minotaur
monsters.description: The minotaur has the upper torso of a muscular woman, and the head, legs, and hooves of a bull. She is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Minotaur
monsters.description: The minotaur has the upper torso of a muscular man, and the head, legs, and hooves of a bull. He is wearing banded mail armor, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Ogress
monsters.description: The ogress resembles an enormous and very ugly woman. She stands over seven feet tall and is very muscular. Her clothing is filthy and poorly made. She is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Ogre
monsters.description: The ogre resembles an enormous and very ugly man. He stands over eight feet tall and is very muscular. His clothing is filthy and poorly made. He is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Swordswoman
monsters.description: The swordswoman has an air of confidance about her. She is wearing chain armor, and is armed with a {0} which she wields skillfully.

monsters.name: Swordsman
monsters.description: The swordsman has an air of confidence about him. He is wearing chain armor, and is armed with a {0} which he wields skillfully.

monsters.name: Larochess
monsters.description: The larochess resembles a large well built woman with pale bluish skin pointed ears, and a short tail. She is very muscular and stands nearly nine feet tall. She is wearing leather armor, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Larochet
monsters.description: The larochet resembles a large well built man with dark bluish skin, pointed ears, and a short tail. He is very muscular and stands over nine feet tall. He is wearing a cuirass, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Female Troll
monsters.description: The troll resembles a large ugly woman with yellowish green skin and wicked claws. Her skin is covered with warts and tufts of stiff greenish hair.

monsters.name: Troll
monsters.description: The troll resembles a large ugly man with brownish green skin and wicked claws. His skin is covered with warts and tufts of stiff greenish hair.

monsters.name: Magmaman
monsters.description: The magmaman resembles a humanoid non-descript creature, seemingly formed from molten rock. He has two thick arm-like appendages, ending in dripping claws.

monsters.name: Ogress Mage
monsters.description: The ogress mage is wearing a steel breastplate and bracers, and is armed with {0}. She is also wearing a dark red cloak.

monsters.name: Ogre Mage
monsters.description: The ogre mage is wearing a steel breastplate and bracers, and is armed with {0}. He is also wearing a dark red cloak.

monsters.name: Warlock
monsters.description: The warlock is dressed in red robes and radiates power. He wields a {0}. Tattooed on his right forearm is a crimson sigil.

monsters.name: Minotaur Chieftain
monsters.description: The minotaur chieftain is a very large member of his species. He is very muscular and stands nearly eight feet tall. He is wearing scalemail armor, and is armed with {0}.

monsters.name: Sorceress
monsters.description: The sorceress is dressed in indigo robes and radiates power. She wields a rod tipped with magical frost. Inscribed on her forehead is a blue rune.

monsters.name: Sorceror
monsters.description: The sorceror is dressed in indigo robes and radiates power. He wields a rod shrouded with magical flame. Inscribed on his forehead is a violet rune.

monsters.name: Female Nomad
monsters.description: The nomad has dark skin and the look of someone hardened by the harsh environment in which she lives. She is wearing dark linen clothing and is armed with a scimitar.

monsters.name: Nomad
monsters.description: The nomad has dark skin and the look of someone hardened by the harsh environment in which he lives. He is wearing dark linen clothing and is armed with a scimitar.

monsters.name: Female Bandit
monsters.description: The bandit has the look of an accomplished rogue, and is dressed in an expensive silk tunic and pants of a rich red color. She is also wearing a chainmail jerkin and is armed with a wicked looking sabre.

monsters.name: Bandit
monsters.description: The bandit has the look of an accomplished rogue, and is dressed in an expensive silk tunic and pants of a deep blue color. He is also wearing a chainmail jerkin and is armed with a wicked looking sabre.

monsters.name: Mystic Knight
monsters.description: The mystic knight has the look of a well seasoned warrior who has seen many a battle in his time. His gear and clothing are the finest available. He is wearing glowing dragonscale armor and wielding a jeweled claymore. Somehow you are aware that he could easily defeat you.

monsters.name: Orc Warrior
monsters.description: The orc warrior is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands just over five feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Orc Subchief
monsters.description: The orc subchief is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands over five feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Orc Chieftain
monsters.description: The orc chieftain is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands well over five feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Orc Shaman
monsters.description: The orc shaman is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. She stands just under five feet in height, is wearing robes, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Orc Warlord
monsters.description: The orc warlord is an average sized humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands just under six feet in height, is wearing gleaming chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Gnoll Warrior
monsters.description: The gnoll warrior is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just under seven feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Gnoll Subchief
monsters.description: The gnoll subchief is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just over seven feet in height, is wearing scalemail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Gnoll Chieftain
monsters.description: The gnoll chieftain is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just over seven feet in height, is wearing scalemail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Gnoll Warlord
monsters.description: The gnoll warlord is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands well over seven feet in height, is wearing gleaming bandmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Gnoll Shaman
monsters.description: The gnoll shaman is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick golden brown body hair. She stands just over six feet in height, is wearing robes, and is armed with {0} {1}.

monsters.name: Stone Warrior
monsters.description: The stone warrior is skillfully crafted and resembles a heavily muscled warrior in full plate armor and stands nearly twenty feet high. It is armed with a huge stone axe.
abilities: swings its axe in a wide arc

monsters.name: Stone Wizard
monsters.description: The stone wizard is skillfully crafted and resembles a gaunt sorceror in flowing robes covered with runes and sigils. It is armed with a stone sceptre topped with a glowing crystal and stands nearly twenty feet high.

monsters.name: Dwarven Guard
monsters.description: The guard is of obvious dwarven blood. He looks very tough and battle hardened. He wears scale mail armor of a design you're unfamiliar with and wields a battleax.

monsters.name: Elite Dwarven Guard
monsters.description: This guard closely resembles his lesser brethren, however his equipment is of a finer quality and he appears more agressive and well disciplined. He wears brushed steel scale mail armor and wields a huge battleax engraved with runes along the edge of the blade.

monsters.name: Dwarven Captain
monsters.description: This grim warrior appears to have seen more than his share of battle, and seems utterly fearless. His dwarven mail is of fine quality and each scale has finely engraved runic designs. He wields a battleax with a haft easily four feet long and a blade blacker than night.

monsters.name: Dwarven Sorceror
monsters.description: The dwarven sorceror has an obvious callousness about his expression, and appears no one to be trifled with. He radiates confidence and power. He wears robes of a deep reddish brown, similar to the hue of the stone in the walls of his home. He carries a black sceptre topped with some sort of softly glowing crystal.

monsters.name: Dwarven Leutenant
monsters.description: This dwarven officer wears scale armor of the finest quality and brandishes a huge battleaxe of fine make with an extraordinarily keen edge. He seems very dignified and confidant.

monsters.name: Dwarven Warlord
monsters.description: This ruthless dwarven battle chief is dressed in heavy scale armor made of a dull bluish metal that seems to absorb light. The weapon in his hands is an enormous battleax with a haft of dark grey wood and a head forged of the same strange metal as his armor. Dimly glowing runes adorn the head of his axe along the edges of the blades.

monsters.name: Smith
monsters.description: This dwarven smith is heavily muscled, his leather apron smeared with sweat and soot. He is very alert and has an expression of great calm and peace of mind. His eyes harden as he notices your intense stare, and he hefts the weight of his great hammer.

monsters.name: Master Smith
monsters.description: This older dwarf is gnarled and bulging with muscle. His leathers smeared with grime and sweat. He seems very calm and at one with his surrounds. The great hammer he cradles in his arms is forged of a dull bluish metal, and almost seems to glow dimly.

monsters.name: Dwarven Archmage
monsters.description: The dwarven archmage has an obvious callousness about his expression, and appears no one to be trifled with. He radiates incredible power. He wears robes of a deep purple hue. He carries a black sceptre topped with some sort of brightly glowing crystal.

monsters.name: Elven Scout
monsters.description: The elven scout peers at you through its forest green eyes.  The stripes painted on his face warn you that he has come across and slain many an unexpecting traveller.  Your doom awaits.

monsters.name: Female Elf
monsters.description: Despite being female, this elf resembles a modern-day war machine. She moves blindingly fast, striking at any possible moment.  Though a good fight is her forte, she is also amazingly beautiful, as female elves always seem to be.

monsters.name: Elven Warrior
monsters.description: This elven warrior is built like a tree, and oddly enough blends in with the trees as well, a warrior of a stealthy sort.  He wields an axe that must have been crafted by the dwarves and enchanted by the high elves.  He is certainly a force to be reckoned with.

monsters.name: Elven Champion
monsters.description: This elven champion is built like a mountain.  There seems to be no escape from this warrior of warriors, a man's man -- only an elf. He wields a great sword that shines like the moons on a good night. Only the most powerful elves can craft such a beast.

monsters.name: Elven Warlord
monsters.description: This elven warlord is about to knock some sense into you with his warhammer.  His evil eyes seem to hypnotize you into giving in to your imminent death.
